mapper.select: SELECT udi.id AS userInfoId, udi.linkman AS linkman, udi.mobile_phone AS mobilephone, udi.identification AS identification, so.id AS operatorid, so.login_acct AS loginacct, so.PASSWORD AS PASSWORD, tsr.id AS staffid, tsr.employee_number AS employeenumber, tsr.staff_position AS staffposition, tsr.lock_flag AS lockflag, ( SELECT group_concat( o.role_id ) FROM sys_user_role o WHERE o.state = 1 AND o.user_id = so.id AND o.tenant_id = tsr.tenant_id GROUP BY o.user_id ) AS roleids, ( SELECT group_concat( u.org_id ) FROM sys_user_org_rel u WHERE u.state = 1 AND u.user_info_id = udi.id AND u.tenant_id = tsr.tenant_id GROUP BY u.user_info_id ) AS orgids FROM user_data_info udi INNER JOIN sys_user so ON udi.id = so.user_info_id INNER JOIN tenant_staff_rel tsr on udi.id = tsr.user_info_id WHERE tsr.state = 1 AND tsr.tenant_id = #{tenantId} AND udi.id = #{userInfoId}
